org.magicdgs.readtools.tools.barcodes.dictionary.decoder

Class BarcodeDecoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.magicdgs.readtools.tools.barcodes.dictionary.decoder.BarcodeDecoder

  • public class BarcodeDecoder
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for matching sequenced barcodes with the indexes contained in a barcode dictionary.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BarcodeDecoder(BarcodeDictionary dictionary, int maxN, boolean nAsMismatches, int[] maxMismatches, int[] minDifferenceWithSecond)
      Default constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BarcodeDecoder

        public BarcodeDecoder(BarcodeDictionary dictionary,
                      int maxN,
                      boolean nAsMismatches,
                      int[] maxMismatches,
                      int[] minDifferenceWithSecond)
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        dictionary - non-null barcode dictionary with indexes to match.
        nAsMismatches - if true, the Ns count as mismatches.
        maxMismatches - maximum number of mismatches allowed (for each barcode).
        minDifferenceWithSecond - the minimum difference in the number of mismatches between the first and the second best barcodes (for each barcode).
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the thresholds are arrays with different lengths than the number of barcodes in the dictionary.

    • Method Detail

      • getDictionary

        public BarcodeDictionary getDictionary()
        Gets the barcode dictionary associated with this object.

      • assignReadGroupByBarcode

        public void assignReadGroupByBarcode(org.broadinstitute.hellbender.utils.read.GATKRead read)
        Assigns the read group to a read using the raw barcodes. If there is no raw barcode, it is assigned to the UNKNOWN one; otherwise, it is assigned by matching the barcodes using the pipeline in getBestBarcodeString(String...).
        Parameters:
        read - the read to asssing the read group.
        Throws:
        UserException.MalformedFile - if the raw barcode length and dictionary number of indexes differs.

      • getBestBarcode

        public java.lang.String getBestBarcode(java.lang.String... barcode)
        Gets the best barcode from barcode strings.
        Parameters:
        barcode - the array of barcodes to match.
        Returns:
        the best real barcode in the dictionary (pasted in order if there are more than one).
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the length of the arrays does not match the number of barcodes in the dictionary.

      • getMatcherStatMetrics

        public htsjdk.samtools.metrics.MetricsFile<MatcherStat,java.lang.Integer> getMatcherStatMetrics()
        Gets the accumulated statistics for barcodes match/mismatch. Note: calling this method recomputes the percentage every time.
        See Also:
        MatcherStat

      • getBarcodeStatMetrics

        public htsjdk.samtools.metrics.MetricsFile<BarcodeStat,java.lang.Integer> getBarcodeStatMetrics()
        Gets the accumulated statistics for each barcode.
        See Also:
        BarcodeStat
